reviewText: If you are a bereaved parent/grandparent this will help you know you are not alone

I found this video very helpful. Rosemary Smith is a wonderful Author and Writer. Children of the Dome is another of her great works. Rosemary is a Pharmacist by trade and only writes true storys about real people.
G.H.

As bereaved parents we are faced with such deep questions and anguish. While this video does not have all of the answers, it is comforting to hear how others have faced their losses. I recommend this for all bereaved parents.
